title: When do we stop getting worlds quests??
body: So I'm just curious so i know if i even have a chance of getting the Ashe Championship Chroma. But how much longer are we gonna keep getting weekly quests for worlds? I just don't want them to be over all of a sudden and I didn't make it. I bought the Master Pass but I am finishing this week with 290 points. As you all know I need 320. Are we gonna get another week of Quests?

replies.body: Per the[ Worlds Missions announcement](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot), you'll have until the day after Finals so roughly Nov 5.  You still have some time, but it's cutting it close!
y there are 1 or 2 weeks left , but definitely enough to get the 320
